main event: Observation of multiple unidentified objects in the Yakima area, with a bright red glow turning white and making erratic maneuvers.
interesting points: The observation took place on September 27, 1957, at approximately 2125Z., The objects wiped out the entire radar scope., The number of objects observed ranged from 6 to 10., A pilot from Northwest Airlines Flight 535 reported the sighting., A bright reddish explosion was noted during the event.
sighted object: bright red glowing object that turned white
witness description: pilot of Northwest Airlines Flight 535 and a tower operator at Yakima Airport
